channel.title: 1 John on Christian Internet Resources
channel.description: Recent content in 1 John on Christian Internet Resources

item.title: 1 John 1
item.description:
1 John Chapter 1

1What was from (the) beginning, what we-have-heard, what we-have-seen with-the eyes of-us, what we-have-observed and the hands of-us have-handled about the word of-[the] life—2and the life was-manifested, and we-have-seen and we-testify and proclaim to-you [the] eternal [the] life that was with the Father and was-manifested to us—3what we-have-seen and have-heard, we-proclaim also to-you in-order-that you also may-have fellowship with us, and [the] our [the] fellowship (is) also with the Father and with the Son of-him Jesus Christ. 4And we write these-things in-order-that the joy of-us may-be fullpf.

item.title: 1 John 2
item.description:
1 John Chapter 2

1My little-children, I-am-writing these-things to-you in-order-that you-may┘not└keep-sinning. And if anybody does-sin, we-have (an) Advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the just. 2And he┘himself└is (the) propitiation for the sins of-us, and not only for [the] our (sins), but also for the whole world. 3And in this we-know that we-have-known him: if we-are-keeping the commandments of-him. 4The-one saying [that], “I-have-known him,” and is┘not└keeping the commandments of-him, is (a) liar, and in this-one the truth is not. 5And whoever2 keeps the word of-him—truly in this-one the love of-[the] God has-been-completed/perfected. By this we-know that we-are in him. 6The-one saying to-reside in him—he himself ought to-walk thus, even-as that-One walked.

item.title: 1 John 4
item.description:
1 John Chapter 4

1Beloved, do┘not└believe every spirit, but test the spirits if/whether they-are from [the] God, because many false-prophets have-gone-out into the world. 2By this you-know the Spirit of-[the] God: every spirit that confesses Jesus Christ has-come in (the) flesh is from [the] God. 3And every spirit that does┘not└confess [the] Jesus is not of/from [the] God. And this is the (spirit) of-the antichrist that you-have-heard that he-is-coming, and now is already in the world. 4You are of/from [the] God, little-children; and you-have-overcome them, because greater is the-One in you than the-One in the world. 5They are of/from the world; because-of this they-speak of/from the world, and the world listens-to them. 6We are of/from [the] God. The-one knowing [the] God listens-to us. Who is not of/from [the] God, does┘not└listen-to us. By this we-know the Spirit of-[the] truth and the spirit of-[the deception.

item.title: 1 John 5
item.description:
1 John Chapter 5

1Every the-one believing that Jesus is the Christ has-been-begotten by [the] God, and every the-one loving the-One having-begotten loves also the-One having-been-begotten by him. 2By this we-know that we-love the children of-[the] God: when we-love [the] God and do the commandments of-him. 3For this is the love of-[the] God: [in-order]-that we-keep the commandments of-him, and the commandments of-him are not heavy/hard. 4Because every the-one having-been-begotten by [the] God overcomes the world, and this is the victory [the] having-overcome the world: the faith of-us. 5And who is the-one overcoming the world unless2 the-one believing that Jesus is the Son of-[the] God.
